Module.Content:
<script charset="utf-8" src="http://widgets.twimg.com/j/2/widget.js"></script>
		<script>
		new TWTR.Widget({
		  version: 2,
		  type: 'search',
		  search: '#dartlang',
		  interval: 30000,
		  title: 'Dart Feed',
		  subject: '#dartlang',
		  width: 'auto',
		  height: 350,
		  theme: {
		    shell: {
		      background: '#8ec1da',
		      color: '#ffffff'
		    },
		    tweets: {
		      background: '#ffffff',
		      color: '#444444',
		      links: '#1985b5'
		    }
		  },
		  features: {
		    scrollbar: true,
		    loop: true,
		    live: true,
		    behavior: 'default'
		  }
		}).render().start();
		</script>
